name: Alon Messi
note:
занимаются организацией свадеб с нуля, нужны лидогенераторы которые будут искать по США клиентов которые собираются жениться. Есть примерная стратегия по составлению списка форумов где могут находиться потенциально заинтересованные люди. Готовы нанимать хоть завтра. Попробовали с Захаровой и Шульгой пару недель, ожидали что результаты будут с первого дня, поэтому остановили их. 

Fresh results : I reminded a client about our company and services.(23.02.2021)

name: Rick Daniels
note:
Updated 14.07.2022

Hello. Please let me know if you are interested in remote employees from Ukraine? If you have any tasks that could be done remotely, we’ll be glad to take them further. Thank you in advance.
By the way, summer SALE had started!

Best regards, Hanna
Rick Daniels sent the following messages at 10:48 PM
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  10:48 PM
Hi Hanna, I'd certainly like to hear more.
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  10:51 PM
The situation over there has to be incredibly difficult and I know people are doing what they can to keep an income going. I spoke with several people who made it out to GDC while their homes were being invaded, it was a difficult conversation to say the least. 

I'd be glad to help out as we do have needs.
Hanna Chumakova sent the following messages at 11:08 PM
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  11:08 PM
Thank you very much, Rick, for your support! I really appreciate for opportunity to cooperate with you. 
Yes. we really very need job in such difficult military time. 
Having hired our employees, you save their life and stability. We'll be very grateful to see you as our client ❤(Edited)

View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  11:10 PM
What specialists are you interested in?
Click or press enter to display Remote_empoyees_specialities.jpg in the image previewRemote_empoyees_specialities.jpg
In attached presentation you can see more information about our company. https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/e/2PACX-1vSleEpaKL1TOz8NV7d2OY7wtS111idiEdrSM_f88_GiCe-F4pqdzX7SUwZn3vDOog/pub?start=true&loop=true&delayms=15000&slide=id.p1
In attached presentation you can see more information about our company. https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/e/2PACX-1vSleEpaKL1TOz8NV7d2OY7wtS111idiEdrSM_f88_GiCe-F4pqdzX7SUwZn3vDOog/pub?start=true&loop=true&delayms=15000&slide=id.p1
You can have a look CVs of our candidates on our website https://rh-s.com/

Home Ukraine
rh-s.com • 1 min read
We have Summer Sale now!
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  11:12 PM
So if you have a need in any of specialists we offer we could set up  a call and give you more information in a brief talk, Please let me know when you are available and I'll create a link for us.

Thanks in advance!
Best regards, Hanna(Edited)

Rick Daniels sent the following messages at 11:26 PM
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  11:26 PM
Can you email me at rick@ghostpunch.com?
That way you aren't forced to keep using LI messaging for links and files. I like it though, LI is great.
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  11:28 PM
We need Unreal designers, possibly a couple of animators, Unity engineers, and like everyone, any programmer that knows Unreal. 

How are you holding up btw?
Hanna Chumakova sent the following message at 11:32 PM
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  11:32 PM
Ok. Sure. I can send information via your email.
Rick, I really appreciate the time you took to consider an opportunity with us. 

Do you mind if we set up a call to discuss the details? Our managers will advice good candidates for you and answer on all questions, Google Meet is convenient for you?
Rick Daniels sent the following messages at 11:36 PM
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  11:36 PM
Sure, how is tomorrow, 9:30 am EST?
We're in Florida
Hanna Chumakova sent the following message at 11:36 PM
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  11:36 PM
Thank you for your disturb. Now I and my family in Ukraine. And it's very difficult to stay here. The heart cries from what is happening. It's hard to believe in this horror. The situation is hard  in economic sphere. But the worst thing is that people die. 
I'm glad that I have a job. It;s very important in such time.
Rick Daniels  11:39 PM
Hanna Chumakova  11:59 PM
The link is on your email and below 

Ghostpunch Games - Remote Helpers
Friday, July 15 · 9.30am-10.00am
Google Meet joining info
Video call link: https://meet.google.com/eod-qwza-dce

Meet
meet.google.com • 1 min read
TODAY
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  12:01 AM
Thank you very much for opportunity to collaborate with you!
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  12:04 AM
Thank you for your supportive words and desire to help!
View Hanna’s profileHanna Chumakova
Hanna Chumakova  12:17 AM
Looking forward to hearing from you tomorrow! Thank you very much one more! It's pleasant to hear that people want to help us, our country in such horrible time!

Best regards,
Hanna
Rick Daniels sent the following messages at 1:18 AM
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  1:18 AM
I wish you all the best, and please stay safe.
View Rick’s profileRick Daniels
Rick Daniels  1:21 AM
this shouldn't be happening, that's for sure. And I do love my country beyond imagination. I can only barely begin to imagine how you're feeling right now as the country you love is under attack. No doubt without the weapons and financial support it would probably have ended long ago. 

No place for this kind of war in today's world. Let's hope for the best.
Looking forward to the call.

name: Rolf Annom
note: Wanted a 3d architectural designer, but agreed on a recruiter who sought for such candidates.

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
recruiter who would be a pro in his field, preferably with a design background, who would be looking for designers/architects, 3dmax, Archicad, and be able to analyze how much of a pro the person is. 
Since we have 3D designers, we offered him our candidate, but after looking at her work, he said that he needs A+ quality candidate as he deals with luxury companies. He is willing to pay 5000 euros per month for this candidate.

client_detail.note: Wanted a 3d architectural designer, but agreed on a recruiter who sought for such candidates.

name: Manfred Schreiner
note:
Сompany Name: Schrema, https://www.schrema.de/
Contact Person: Simon Schreiner
Product: printing agency 
Services Provided: sell product with logo for customer
Country-Location: Germany
Target Audience: people who are interested in creating logo
Immediate Requirement: fluent in German to be able to communicate with people in the office, but they won't be speaking with clients, traffic illustrator, coral draw, graphic designer 
Next Step: send cv's of possible candidates and we will organise an interview
Next Contact Date: he will think about it and write us after weekends ( so busy next week)

Сompany Name: Schrema, https://www.schrema.de/
Contact Person: Simon Schreiner
Product: printing agency 
We organised an interview with candidates for schrema GmbH & Co. KG

Candidates:

Iryna - https://rh-s.com/designers/iryna-h/ (illustrator) - designer, vectra, portraits, illustrations, logos, can speak and write in german

Simon likes Iryna, he will give her test task, he needs one more call to invite colellague and talk with Irina one more time.

Next contact date: April 6 4:00 pm (our time
Сompany Name: Schrema, https://www.schrema.de/
Contact Person: Simon Schreiner
Product: printing agency
We're interviewing designer Iryna: https://rh-s.com/designers/iryna-h/.

We're discussing Iryna's test task. Simon really liked it but he'll be ready to start work with Iryna from the May 3rd. He'll sign the SA and we'll wait start day. Before that he needs to prepare his working plan. Also, he'll send all additional information about working process and little introductory assigment to Iryna, so she could start work properly and completely in the start day.

client_candidates.comment: Responsibilities: they only mentioned that Alex has to work with the SAP system based on PrestaShop. Their code is in German, but it is okay if Alex speaks only English.
Responsibilities: they only mentioned that Alex has to work with the SAP system based on PrestaShop. Their code is in German, but it is okay if Alex speaks only English.
